name: ComprehensivePassagesforKid's
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: comprehensive passages
des:
Ths skill is activated by wake word of "Alexa, open Comprehensive Passages".

This skill has amazon polly support where user can talk to alexa in english language only but user can ask alexa to speak in many polly supported languages by saying just as "get English/French..".

This skill takes input as English Language & but it can delivers response speech in multiple polly languages.

The passage stories are dynamically streamed from S3 environment where it has a capability of uploading many stories into S3 & listen through alexa with out any code changes.

When alexa streaming the story user can jump to the next story by just saying "Next Story".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
